response: Welcome to our product training module, focusing on the features and specifications of OLA scooters. We'll delve into digital technology, performance, and unique features, and how they provide advantages and benefits over the competition. Our module is structured into sections: introduction to OLA scooter, understanding your OLA scooter, its design, technology, and performance, ease of ownership, fabulous features, the OLA scooter family, and a competitive comparison. Let's get started.
title: L1.1.1 Introduction to Product Module.mp4
